column5: Welcome to the Cove. Relax in our beautiful home or choose to sit out on the upstairs porch overlooking the hill country. The private bedroom has a comfortable queen bed with storage for your belongings. Along with a private bathroom. Enjoy access to our kitchen, living room, porches, laundry and yard. We have an extra driveway for your RV. Our house is close to Highland and Lago Vista golf courses, Lake Travis, Wedding Venues, local parks and 45 minutes from downtown Austin.
